articles.title: Azerbaijan, Armenia, U.S. Sign Key Agreements in Washington
articles.description: Azerbaijan, Armenia, and the United States signed landmark agreements in Washington on August 8, advancing the South Caucasus peace process and opening a new chapter in U.S.–Azerbaijan relations.

articles.title: Trump’s Tariffs Come Into Force
articles.description: The United States began imposing tariffs of 10% or higher on goods from more than 60 countries and the European Union on Thursday, leading to economic fallout with growth and job gains slowing and inflation ticking upward.

articles.title: Capacity Secures Massive Funding to Transform Contact Centers
articles.description: Capacity, the AI powerhouse transforming how businesses handle customer support, closed an impressive $92.6 million funding round, positioning itself at the forefront of contact center automation.
